nodes.text: The Cupola was a location on the planet Coruscant. At some point before the Campaign at Salient, the lawyer Arsha Lome and Governor Wilhuff Tarkin visited the Cupola. When Lome contacted Tarkin via hologram to discuss a matter about her clients recent involvement in a smuggling operation in the Western Reaches, Lome suggested to Tarkin that they visit the Cupola next time Tarkin was on Coruscant.
